product_name: Rollerblade Spitfire TW Inline Skates - Kids' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Rollerblade Spitfire TW inline skates have an adjustable fit, expanding 4 sizes to keep kids skating as their feet grow. Expandable boots extend with toe-area latch; rip-and-stick support strap adjusts for width as well as length; fits kids' sizes 11J to 1 and 5 to 8. Composite frames offer durable stability, performing steadily through endless hours of skating fun. Buckle and power strap secure the fit and support the ankles of young skaters. Speedlace lacing system helps tighten boots for the perfect fit; lacing system locks in place for a perfect fit the entire day. Rollerblade SG5 bearings and 72mm wheels offer smooth, reliable rolling wherever their skates take them. Rollerblade Spitfire TW inline skates size 11J - 1 has 3 wheels; size 5 - 8 features 4 wheels. Closeout.
short_description: The Rollerblade Spitfire TW inline skates have an adjustable fit, expanding 4 sizes to keep kids skating as their feet grow.
